system.note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Boltgun of the Deathwatch. Has integrated Fire Selector, Targeter, and Melee Attachment (Master-Crafted Astartes Combat Knife). Never Jams. Reroll attack rolls of 96-100.

description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Accurate, Tearing

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Boltgun of the Deathwatch. Has integrated Fire Selector, Targeter, and Melee Attachment (Master-Crafted Astartes Combat Knife). Never Jams. Reroll attack rolls of 96-100.
